message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm starting with a price of $12000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10500. Is this a price you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $8000. Would you be willing to consider $9000?

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $10000. This is my best price, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above $8000. Would you be willing to consider $9500?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $9800. This is my final concession, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9200?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $9200, Bob. I'm starting to think we're at a stalemate. I'm going to try one more time to meet you in the middle. I'm counteroffering at $9350. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
